name: The Coffee Break Shootout!
overview: Psytronik Software presents a debut C64 release from Stephan Katteneder with music by Saul Cross. While away your coffee breaks by blasting the birdies as they majestically flap their way across the screen in this fun target-shooter. Line up your cross-hair sights and get your timing right - or the bird will mock you and fly away to survive another day. Try to beat your last score before the timer - or your coffee break runs out! The Coffee Break Shootout ** FEATURES ** · Superbly animated birdies to blast · Nicely drawn seasonal backdrops · 1351 Mouse support · Catchy soundtracks · PAL & NTSC compatible This game was released in a double pack along with Total Refill.
